  • 23 Oct 2009

    As the wind blows...


    I sit near your final resting place. trying to remember everything you said, you did, your smiles, the way you were…even your last days…i look upon my life and the way it connected with you. i remember the time you used to come back from work and the way i used to hug you, the way you took me in your arms when i was a little boy. the way you used to tell me right and wrong, the things i learnt from your wisdom. the way you always appeared a king to me.

    Read More...

    Posted under thoughts

  • 03 Jul 2009

    NXT Rotation Sensor Program

    My buddies are working on Lego Mindstorms NXT this year. with a tougher floor plan than last time and an even tougher goal, I decided to help them out with a small program that proved to be very useful to me last year.

    This program actually measures the rotations of a motor. all the user has to do is hold the NXT in one hand and a motor connected to it in the other. Running the motor by hand on the floor plan shows the degrees of rotation on the NXT’s Screen.

    So here it is guys. May this help you with all the NERC’s. and may we Win this year. Amen.

    http://bit.ly/k0sbl
